Articles.Content:
<p>Thank you all for participating in today’s Reddit AmA. We hope your biggest questions were answered and that you had fun hanging with the team. It was quite fun on our side, too. Heck, we even topped the “rent is too high” guy on the front page!</p>

<p>You know, they say that if you look towards the stars, you’ll always find something special.</p>

<p><img src="http://media.tumblr.com/aeaa7a57a1b6537500a7de5ac5f2fdfc/tumblr_inline_mw87g2ajvE1rr2wit.png"/></p>

Errr hmm, I saw the image with the message earlier, but whatever is happening with it in this thread has taken out the hidden message, its just a star field now.

If you're like me, you can still see the hidden-ness in this original:

I saw it in the image posted at the top of this thread, I just saved it to my computer and opened it up in MS Paint and viewed it at 300% magnification and it was clear as day. In fact, you can see it without magnification if you view it from a downward-looking angle (stand up and look down at the image).

spoiler

i added a color mask so its a bit more clear

http://bas126.deviantart.com/art/Ksppic-413561627?ga_submit_new=10%253A1384456450&ga_type=edit&ga_changes=1&ga_recent=1
The message says KerbalKon Third anniversary. Below it says DECEMBER 12-13. Just saying in case anyone missed it. I read it on my iPod and it looked pretty obvious to me.
As long as there are Kerbal plushies.
